Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND SUBSTANCE ABUSE

Title: Relates to the payment for services at addiction treatment centers operated by the office of addiction services and supports
Summary: Relates to the payment for services at addiction treatment centers operated by the office of addiction services and supports; requires that services shall not be refused at such centers if a person is unable to pay.
LawCode: Amd ยง25.17, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to the payment for services at addiction treatment centers operated by the office of addiction services and supports
